posts.post_content:
Here are a few items I have decided to put up for trade. I am looking for pre-war (esp. pre-1930) Hall of Famers, and lower grades (1 to 4) are fine. No trimmed/altered cards, please. I just enjoy trading to get some new cards, so let me know what you have!

Mark

*1910-12 Sweet Caporal P2 Pins "Old" Cy Young Plain Cap Variant BVG 6
*1909-11 T206 Piedmont 350-460, Factory 25 Zach Wheat BVG 2.5
*1921 Type I News Photo (card-sized) Jack Dempsey BVG Authentic
*1947 Homogenized Bond Bread Ralph Kiner RC NM-MT+ O/C
*2001 Fleer Greats of the Game Negro League Autographs Artie Wilson MT
*2001 Fleer Greats of the Game Negro League Autographs Lester Lockett MT
*2001 Fleer Greats of the Game Negro League Autographs Wilmer Fields MT
